name: Restless Spinner
description: In this game the user press the button to stop giving force to the rotating spinner so the constant revelation can come to an alt. Our goal in game is the alt possession should only be an end marker [The red boxes in the game]. After being alt for at least 20sec the game shall move to the next level. The game difficulty will be relevant to that particular level but the relevant game is covered in a single it has 45*3*3*20 at least 7200 combination of levels available without coming in al set of combination.
